name: Optimizer
description:
Mission

Optimize your NN. Find the minimum by moving left or right with the arrow keys. You can change the axis you move in by hitting the space bar.

The minimum is a hole in the terrain. Get there as quickly as possible! The minimap displays the height of the places you have already been to. Try to find the minimum (yellow color)!

Controls

ESC - back to title screen

F - toggle fullscreen

SPACE - change axis

LEFT - move left

RIGHT - move right
